idea:
We are a credit card challenger for people without a credit score. With just 3 credit cards per 100 people in India and a credit bureau coverage of just 56%, access to credit continues to remain exclusive to a choosen few in the country.


Neowise uses proof of consistent income as the main base to underwrite a credit limit, regardless of credit score (or the lack of one). The Neowise card has all the standard functonalities of a credit card (30-45 days interest free period), with the added benefit of frictionles and inexpensive ATM withdrawals, and the ability to make bank transfers (using UPI/IMPS). Customers are onboarded in lesser than 30 mins and a virtual card is issued instantaneously.


The idea is to help people build their credit score using the Neowise card, while eventually being able to cross-sell and upsell other credit and banking instruments to them as they progress along the value chain.
name: NEOWISE TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED
